wikitext.*:
{{disambig-more|Evendim|[[Evendim (disambiguation)]]}}
'''Evendim''' was a [[Hobbitish]] name to refer to the dusk of the evening known to the Elves as ''[[aduial]]'' or ''[[undómë]]''.<ref>{{App|D2}}</ref> 

==Etymology==
The name is composed by an element for "evening", and ''dim'' which refers to dusk/gloaming.<ref>{{HM|N}}, p. 773</ref>

==See also==
*[[Morrowdim]]
